column1: # Figures in the 1921 and 1923 columns are not readings from Wrawby Road and have been omitted.
# They are part of a calculation of an estimate for 1920-1925 based on aggregate readings from the Brigg Bridge Street site.
# The January 1926 reading is an estimate for the month before the gauge began operating, and has been omitted.
# The station continued until 1978 according to MIDAS (labelled Eastfield Road)
